title: Study on the Effectiveness of Offline Utilization of Online Learning Materials: Phenomenological Discussion and Data Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using online learning platforms (e.g., FutureLearn) and understanding of basic scientific concepts
context.additional_context: A situation where learners with mid-level expertise in medical/legal/technical fields study via mobile devices in a BYOD environment, conducted with a focus on formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the effects of offline/printed materials from a phenomenological perspective
Learners can comparatively evaluate the strengths and weaknesses of online and offline learning methods based on discussion data
Learners can design offline utilization strategies for online learning materials tailored to their professional field (science)

resources: Access to Online Learning Platforms (e.g., FutureLearn)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
